name: ParaNichi: Magical Romance
storyline:
You're an aspiring fashion designer, desperate to take the plunge and move out of your oppressive parents' house.

Eventually, you come across a fantastic deal for a room in a share house. The rooms are fully-furnished, the neighborhood is great, and the roommates seem nice... But you soon discover the catch is that the house is haunted! Not only that, but one of your roommates is a witch...?!

As you grow closer to each of them, you come to realize everyone harbors a secret. The question is whether that secret is dangerous to you... or them.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: PARANICHI: MAGICAL ROMANCE // FREE UPCOMING OTOME GAME
